unit_rules.name: Teleport Homer
unit_rules.text: At the start of the battle, you may set up one Teleport Homer token for this unit anywhere on the Battlefield except your opponent's deployment zone. Once per battle, you may target this unit with the Rapid Ingress Strategem for 0 CP, provided that this unit is set up within 3" horizontally of that token and not within 9" of any enemy models. Remove the token.

unit_rules.name: Fury of the First
unit_rules.text: When attacking, you may choose to ignore any modifiers to Hit rolls and/or to the attack's Ranged Skill or Melee Skill.

unit_rules.name: Wrath of the Crux Terminatus
unit_rules.text: Add +1 to the Hit roll of attacks made against your army's Oath of Moment target.
